summary: I HAVE A NISSAN ALTIMA COUPE 2008 2-DOOR AND MY DASH IS MELTING.  I LIVE IN FLORIDA AND NOW THE GLARE OF THE DASH MELTING IS PUTTING A GLARE ON MY WINDSHIELD AND IS BEGINNING TO BE A DANGEROUS DRIVING SITUATION.  I HAVE RESEARCHED THIS AND IT SEEMS TO BE A PROBLEM WITH THIS VEHICLE.  TODAY I FILED A COMPLAINT WITH NISSAN AND I AM WAITING TO HERE BACK.    *TR
